name: Sus Storm
description:
Sus Storm is a memey bullet hell that I made as my first Pico-8 game.
Evade all the sussy imposters oozing out of the vent!

I have no idea why I chose Among Us as a theme since the meme died months ago. But have fun with it, it's easily exploitable, but it's playable and I'm proud of it.

If you want to check out my shitty code or/and rather play the game in Pico-8 itself, here is the cartridge
